content.text:
# List of Asam Sahitya Sabha presidents__disambig_1

Asam Sahitya Sabha (),  or ") was founded in 1917 in Assam, India to promote the culture of Assam and Assamese literature.
Except regular biennially seasons in 2000 and 2002 special session was held at Jorhat and Kalgachia.
